tool_description: Get the heroes, items, teams with their earnings, rosters, tournaments and professional games.
name: Dota 2
title: Dota 2

api_list.name: Get Tournaments
api_list.description: The endpoint tournaments allows you to get the next tournaments.

api_list.name: Get Team
api_list.description: The `/teams?id=id` endpoint allows you to consume the information of a team according to its id.

api_list.name: Get Teams
api_list.description: The endpoint teams allows you to consume all the teams in active or inactive state.

api_list.name: Get Matches
api_list.description: The endpoint matches allows you to get live and upcoming games.

api_list.name: Get Items
api_list.description: The endpoint items allows you to obtain the game items.

api_list.name: Get Heroes
api_list.description: The endpoint heroes allows to obtain a list with all the heroes of the game.
